mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_file_system_name, member_type, member_drive_register_date, member_point) VALUES({#memberIdentification}, {#memberPassword},{#memberName},{#memberPhone}, {#memberEmail},{#memberFileSystemName},{#memberType},{#memberDriveRegisterDate}, 0);
